oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Apollo 16 - Moon travel tapes - Tape 1 Side 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Tape 1 (Side 2). Program sent on the Apollo 16 space mission for Charlie Duke's (astronaut) enjoyment. Originally from a cassette Tape. Tape featuring Bill Bailey (host), Buck Owens, Buck Owens & The Buckaroos, Susan Raye, and the Bakersfield Brass.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Bill Bailey; Merle Haggard; Bobby Wayne; Kelli Haggard; The Strangers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Bill Bailey opening remarks addressing the Apollo 16 crew and introduces the Merle Haggard -- (00:02) Blues Like Midnight (Merle Haggard) -- (02:32) Merle Haggard addresses Apollo 16 crew and introduces band members -- (04:30) Carolyn (Merle Haggard) -- (08:50) Merle addresses astronauts about childhood dreams -- (09:24) No Reason to Quit (Merle Haggard) -- (11:40) Merle Haggard quickly comments on appreciation for astronauts -- (11:55) Today I Started Loving You Again (Merle Haggard) -- (13:55) Bobby Wayne joking about country roads -- (15:03) Daddy Frank (Merle Haggard with help from Kelli Marie Haggard (Merle's Daughter) and her friend Kim) -- (18:28) Someday We'll Look Back (Merle Haggard) -- (20:48) Merle addresses astronauts / asks about the moon -- (21:34) Sleepwalk (The Strangers) -- (23:28) Merle addresses astronauts briefly about marijuana -- (23:40) Okie from Muskogee (Merle Haggard) -- (26:07) Merle addresses astronauts -- (26:22) Life's Railway To Heaven (Merle Haggard) -- (28:28) Merle Haggard closing comments -- (28:53) Bill Bailey closing remarks
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Bailey, Bill; Bailey, Bill, 1886-1962; Haggard, Merle; Haggard, Merle, 1937-2016; Wayne, Bobby; Wayne, Bobby, 1936-; Haggard, Kelli; The Stangers
